content.title: Technical SEO Analysis
content.content: Our SEO experts conduct a comprehensive website site audit to determine areas that need optimization. Based on our findings, we give recommendations to improve the site's performance in SERPs.

content.title: Keyword Research and Optimization
content.content: After identifying business-oriented keywords for your business comes optimizing website content with the right keyword density along with authentic and authorized information. There are various areas of keyword optimization that we master at VALUABLE MULTIMEDIA.

content.title: Content Optimization
content.content: Good content can win you prospects and ranking in Google. At VALUABLE MULTIMEDIA, we create engaging, intuitive, plagiarism-free and appropriately keyword-optimized content so that you can benefit from both.

content.title: On-page SEO
content.content: Optimizing your website content such as alt text for images, keywords, header and title tags, anchor tags, meta, site structure etc falls under the umbrella of our on-page SEO practices.

content.title: Off-page SEO (Link Building)
content.content: Link-building practices and great content help businesses gain the attention of the related audience and also increase their credibility. We get to the source of the links and connect with only good-quality websites to achieve the best link juices.

content.title: Google Analytics
content.content: Get data-driven insights on parameters that are working in your favor or the other way around with Google tag manager and other tracking codes that we deploy as part of SEO.

content.title: Voice Search
content.content: 71% of users search using voice commands. Inculcating conversational keywords in your content is one of our many SEO techniques to optimize for voice search.

content.title: Image/Video Optimization
content.content: Alt text, description, quality, speed and more, these are various parameters that are optimized as a part of image and video optimization. It helps search engine crawlers understand the intent of the image or the video in relevance to the webpage content.

information.title: Keywords Research
information.content: Being masters at search engine marketing, our paid media experts will conduct thorough keyword research and come up with a set of keywords that aligns best with your business as well would bring you bounteous conversions.

information.title: Copywriting for
information.content: We would power up your PPC campaign with fresh creative and compelling content. While data helps find the target audience, a great design and message would let you hit the bull's eye.

information.title: Suggestions for
information.content: In the words of Brian Halligan, 'You can increase conversion rate and ROI by several times by making PPC landing pages extremely relevant'. That is exactly what we do!

information.title: Bid
information.content: Our PPC managers strategically plan the bids. We would bid on the keywords that are likely to give you great ROI for every penny you have invested.

information.title: Conversions and Sales
information.content: PPC facilitates conversions and sales tracking with codes and other tools. They act as a compass heading us in the right direction.

information.title: PPC Monitoring &
information.content: We adopt an iterative, sprint-based approach and take the performance data and audience insights into consideration and optimize the campaign strategically based on data. Lastly, a comprehensive and transparent report is sent to clients to review their ad spends.

faqs.title: What is SEM or PPC?
faqs.content: SEM refers to Search Engine Marketing also known as PPC (Pay Per Click). SEM involves various practices to surpass the stack of websites and appear in the best location on the first page of Google. It further allows you to appear on various applications and devices of your intended audience at the desired time. In a nutshell, SEM helps in achieving faster results.

faqs.title: Is SEM different than SEO?
faqs.content: SEM is optimizing your website's visibility on the search engines like Google through paid ads. You achieve faster results but only for the time, you run your ads. Whereas, SEO is a long-term strategy for organic growth. Results take time but help you drive consistent traffic m-o-m.

faqs.title: How will PPC benefit my business?
faqs.content: PPC drives quick results in your website optimization endeavors. Here are all the perks of PPC marketing: Fast results, Branding, Precise targeting, Measure performance

faqs.title: Why choose VALUABLE MULTIMEDIA's PPC management services?
faqs.content: We Commit, We Deliver. At VALUABLE MULTIMEDIA, we take complete ownership of your PPC campaigns and commit every resource to achieve the desired objective. This sincerity has entitled us to be a result-oriented PPC company in India.

faqs.title: Who will be the point of contact for our campaign-related queries?
faqs.content: Our dedicated client servicing managers will assist your every query for any of our services that you avail.
